action_log.summary: Team DELTA-7 executed perfect silent infiltration of tunnel network. Coordinated sentry elimination, electronic countermeasures, and initial penetration achieved with zero alerts raised.
consequences: Electronic alarm grid disabled for 8-minute window
Team cohesion strengthened through successful coordination
Individual character confidence building in specialized roles

next_event_setup.trigger: Team encounters first major branch point requiring tactical decision on search pattern
